hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Having trouble defeating Dark Link?^Look away from him while holding Z-Target and then when Dark Link walks up behind you, strafe sideways and slash your sword.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

GC (Maze).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Map# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Goron City#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Hylian Shield#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #Saria's Song#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Switch Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Big Poe Bottle#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: I heard @ is pretty good at Zelda.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Hover Boots#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #4# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #gold#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Did you know that the Boomerang instantly stuns Phantom Ganon's second form?

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Temple of Time#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Huge Rupee#.
